title: The Diary of Geoffrey Blip
description: Geoffrey Blip lives on the planet Paz. It is a lovely planet and every night Geoffrey escapes to wondrous places by watching it all on television. But Geoffrey isnâ€™t happy. He has an overwhelming feeling that there is something more to life. A diary his only company, Geoffrey Blip jumps aboard a mail-order rocket ship and blasts towards the stars in search of adventure. What he finds is Earth.But not everything goes to plan for Geoffrey Blip. He is lost in a big city, he is hungry and he is cold, but worst of all Geoffrey has run out of bubble-gum.The Diary of Geoffrey Blip is a heart-felt tale of hope, adventure and self-discovery. Young and old alike will delight in the playful verse, the illustrations and the quirky observations. Prepare your belly for a giggle and save some room in your heart for a little alien named Geoffrey Blip.
author: Bruce Foot
